hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
ECR_REGISTRY_URL=730096353738.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com EC2_INSTANCE_ID=i-099de1c5407493f9b POM_ARTIFACT_ID=hello-world POM_VERSION=0.0.1-SNAPSHOT DOCKER_TAG="${ECR_REGISTRY_URL}/${POM_ARTIFACTID}:${POM_VERSION}" PROFILE=sandbox BASE64=$(\ echo "EXISTING_IMAGE_ID=\$(docker images \ | grep -P \"${ECR_REGISTRY_URL}/${POM_ARTIFACTID}\s+${POM_VERSION}\" \ | sed -r -n 's/[[:blank:]]+/ /gp' \ | cut -d ' ' -f 3) && \ echo \"1. \${EXISTING_IMAGE_ID}\" >> /tmp/testing && \ if [ -n \"\${EXISTING_IMAGE_ID}\" ]; then \ echo \"2. \${EXISTING_IMAGE_ID}\" >> /tmp/testing; \ fi" | base64 -w 0 \ )
# BASE64=$(echo "HELLO=\"hello and\" && echo \$HELLO >> /tmp/testing && echo goodbye >> /tmp/testing" | base64 -w 0)
run_command_id=$(/usr/local/aws/bin/aws ssm send-command \ --instance-ids "${EC2_INSTANCE_ID}" \ --document-name "AWS-RunShellScript" \ --comment "Running shell script to pull and run container against a new docker image for hello-world" \ --parameters commands="echo ${BASE64} | base64 --decode | sh" \ --profile "${PROFILE}" \ --output text \ --query "Command.CommandId")
